title: Dave Barry Talks Back
description: Yet another collection of wit and wisdom by Pulitzer Prize–winning humorist and author Dave Barry . This collection of essays explores a range of topics including traffic cops, dentists, and Congress. "Want to impress your friends? Tell them you read the latest work by the 1988 Pulitzer Prize-winner for commentary. Just don't tell them it's full of booger jokes".--Orange County Register
author: Dave Barry
